        <acceptance_criteria>When user logs a change, he will be able to see those fields</acceptance_criteria>

        <description>The change form will have the following fields:
1. Description of Change	Description	Free text
2. Why its required?	Justification	Free text
3. Expected Benefits		Free text
4. Impact of Completing Change	Remove	
5. Impact of Not Completing Change	Remove	
6. Information Security Risks (C.I.A)	C / I / A	Choice List
7. Assumptions Made		Free text
8. Who is Affected?	Impact	Choice List
9. What Systems are Affected?	Category	Choice list
10. Date Time for Change to take place	Start Date and time	Date / time
11. Roll-Back Plan	Backout Plan	Free text
12. Priority of Change	Priority	Choice List
13. How will this Change be tested after it has been made?	Test Plan	Free text
14. Has Customer Documentation been updated? (if not, please complete for approval)	Yes / No	Choice List
15. Has the Change been communicated out to Support? (if not, please communicate out to Support prior to the change taking place)	Yes / No (mandatory)	Choice List
16. Further Comments	Free text	Free text
</description>
